data.title: Sunshine (Rye Rye song)
data.text:
2010 single by Rye Rye featuring M.I.A.

Sunshine (The Remixes)EP by ReleasedNovember 2, 2010 (digital)

November 22, 2010 (physical)GenreElectronicLabel

N.E.E.T.

Interscope

ProducerM.I.A.

"Sunshine" is a song and single by rapper/dancer Rye Rye featuring M.I.A. It was recorded in 2008 and released in 2010 and serves as the first single from her debut album Go! Pop! Bang! (2012).[1] The release on N.E.E.T. Recordings (via Interscope Records) was followed by an extended play of remixes, including work by The Cataracs, 12th Planet, MSTRKRFT, and L.A. Riots. The song also appeared in the episode "While You Weren't Sleeping" of the TV series Gossip Girl.[2] and The Bling Ring.

Music video

[edit]

'The clip celebrates Rye Rye's urban upbringing, with b-girl dance moves, double dutching, and pick-up games. The video is the second video of Rye Rye's to feature M.I.A., after her debut video "Bang". Contrary to sources' claims, the video was not shot in Rye Rye's hometown of Baltimore instead the video was shot by director Jess Holzworth, in the Greenpoint area of Brooklyn, NY.[3]
